---
title: "LaTeX multiple PDF standards"
lang: en
format: pdf
pdf-standard: [a-4f, ua-2]
keep-tex: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    run:
      # verapdf validation not available on Windows CI
      not_os: windows
    pdf:
      noErrors: default
      ensureLatexFileRegexMatches:
        - ['\\DocumentMetadata\{', 'pdfstandard=\{a-4f,ua-2\}', 'tagging=on']
        - []
---

# Test Document

This tests combined PDF/A-4f + PDF/UA-2 output with LaTeX.

PDF/A-4f (file) and PDF/UA-2 are compatible - both use PDF 2.0 and
pass verapdf validation together.
